alert.note: Alert for Upper Yampa River Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 26 at 3:01PM MST until January 28 at 5:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Prolonged period of snow. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 15 inches with locally higher amounts. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Upper Yampa River Basin. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 5 PM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult at times. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
